common_openings: I sent you a couple emails yesterday with multiple HCP in each.  If you want to disregard those I can resend in that format.  Also, would you like each HCP in a separate email?
No problem.  Let me know when you guys are ready and we will make it happen.
Awesome.  Are these speeds working for you or would you like to see solutions with higher speeds?
Looks like they are extending the window so at least it's not as big of a time crunch now.  Let us know if we can help in anyway.
avoid_phrases: I hope this email finds you well
